page.title: 07MR MELLOR, TEACHER
page.content: MR MELLOR IS A TEACHER AT ARBURY PRIMARY SCHOOL. HE LIKES HIS JOB BECAUSE HE SAYS IT KEEPS HIS MIND ACTIVE. THE MAIN REASON THAT HE CHOSE HIS JOB IS BECAUSE HE LIKED HIS PRIMARY SCHOOL TEACHERS. HE LIKES THE PEOPLE THAT WORK IN ARBURY SCHOOL AND HE HAS WORKED AS A TEACHER SINCE 1974. MR MELLOR LIVES AT GREENS ROAD. HE HAS LIVED THERE FOR THREE AND A HALF YEARS. HE LIKES ARBURYS GREEN SPACES AND SAYS IT IS FAIRLY CLEAN. HE DISLIKES ALL THE BUILDINGS. IN HIS SPARE TIME HE PLAYS GOLF AND GOES WALKING. HE IS INTERESTED IN OLD HISTORICAL BUILDINGS. HE WOULD LIKE TO TRAVEL MORE AND GO TO THE THEATRE. IT IS 5 MINUTES WALK FROM HIS HOUSE TO THE SHOPS. MR MELLOR SAYS HE DOES LOTS OF HOUSE - WORK. THERE IS NOT ANYTHING IN THE HOUSE HIS WIFE DOES THAT HE DOES NOT.
